data.title: Hotels near Migros museum for contemporary art
data.meta_description: Cheap hotels near the Migros museum for contemporary art. All hotel offers in the vicinity of the Zurich in Migros museum for contemporary art including evaluations and current prices as well as the distance to the hotel.
data.text:
Both private and business travellers can enjoy a comfortable stay at the H+ Hotel Zürich. Every spacious room features stylish decor and is fully equipped with modern conveniences. Be delighted by the multifaceted variety of delicious dishes in the friendly restaurant. HRS guests benefit from free Wi-Fi access in their rooms. The hotel is conveniently situated in the heart of Zurich and in the immediate vicinity of Letzigrund stadium. Freihofstrasse tram station is reachable within a few minutes’ walk and provides easy access to favorite attractions such as the Bahnhofstrasse shopping boulevard and the beautiful Lake Zurich. The hotel holds 5 conference rooms for up to 100 persons, free of charge W-LAN access in all the locations, newest technical standard, all room with daylight, 69 underground parking lots. Fitnessroom and Sauna free of charge. Please note that the hotel reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards. Information: At check-in, a deposit of CHF 50.00 per day will be charged or blocked on the credit card.

The Alexander Hotel in Zurich is a personally-run 3-star hotel. The 41 neat rooms are spacious and feature satellite TV, safe, minibar, and air conditioning. A free Wi-Fi Internet access is available throughout the hotel. Parking in the nearby garage is available for an additional fee. The hotel Alexander is located in Zurich, in the heart of the historic old town. The main railway station is situated just a 5 minute walk away, the airport Zurich-Kloten is reachable within 10 minutes by suburban railway. Many museums and the theatre as well as the university or the financial district are within walking distance. Our hotel fascinates by his perfect situation. All places of interest are accessible on foot. - Free WLAN access. Besides, most rooms are equipped with air-conditioning.

The Adler in Zurich offers the maximum service in the heart of Zurich. Wi-Fi internet access is available in the entire building. Moreover, the reception is open 24h a day. The charming hotel Adler is centrally located in Niederdorf, a district of Zurich. The main railway station, the art house, Fraumünster abbey, Grossmünster cathedral and the opera can be reached on foot. The nearby Bellevue provides a magnificent view over Lake Zurich, which is only 10 minutes away from the hotel. The Restaurant Swiss Chuchi is famous for there Swiss spezilites like Cheese Fondue in many different variations or Racelettes. Home made Cordon Blues and monthly seasonal dishes.

The Best Western Hotel Zürcherhof in Zurich is a modern business hotel. Its comfortable rooms are equipped with bath/WC, minibar, safe, cable TV, and Wi-Fi access. It is possible to reserve parking spaces. The Best Western Hotel Zürcherhof is situated in the heart of Zurich, only 6 minutes away on foot from the railway station and 10 minutes away from the lake. Zurich is the largest city of Switzerland and offers numerous sights as well as museums and theatres. All rooms are newly renovated in March 2014. The modern and stylish guest rooms are equipped with a shower/toilet, sat-TV with smart fuction, free WLAN, water kettle, Safe and free minibar drinks.

The Scheuble in Zurich is a traditional hotel dating from the 19th century. The 64 rooms are individually decorated and arranged with attention to detail, providing a unique charm. The rooms are equipped with Wi-Fi access, TV, shower/bath, and toilet. The hotel Scheuble is situated in Zurich, only 15 minutes away from the international airport and a few steps away from the main railway station. Besides many cultural attractions, such as the State Museum and the Art House, numerous leisure facilities like a Chinese garden or the zoo are available. Between November 7th 2016 and February 30th 2017 the rooms on the upper floors are being renovated. During that period, slight noise pollution during the day may occur.

The modern hotel Leoneck in Zurich is a charming and elegant accommodation. Decorated with the contemporary masterpieces of Zurich artists, it offers a very individual ambience of well-being and relaxation. The hotel is appreciated by both tourists and business travellers. The Leoneck is centrally located in Zurich in Switzerland, 5 minutes away from the main railway station. Numerous shopping malls and the financial district are within walking distance. The University of Zurich and several hospitals are situated in close proximity. The exhibition centre Oerlikon and the airport can be reached by interurban train within 20 and 30 minutes, respectively. Business-Internetcorner in the lobby and Wireless LAN in the whole hotel free of charge. All rooms with AC, parking available on request for an additional charge of CHF 30,- per night. Local calls free of charge

The well-kept old building of the city hotel stands impressively in a street corner and warmly welcomes its guests. The interior is modern, comfortable, and cosy. After a restful night, have a tasty Swiss breakfast that prepares you for your city exploration. The hotel St. Georges is located in the heart of the largest city in Switzerland: Zurich. The neighbourhood around the hotel offers a colourful mix of shops and gastronomy. Famous Lake Zurich is a pleasant walk away and can be enjoyed during a boat trip. Stroll through the beautiful medieval old town and delight in the easy-going flair of the city. At the reception you can buy parking tickets for the public parking lots in the blue zones around the hotel at CHF 15.00. Pets are allowed.

The combination of tradition and modernity create a pleasant atmosphere to stay. The house offers 24 hours all the amenities of a **** city hotel and offers with one of the best restaurants in the city ("differente") everything for a perfect stay. After a major refurbishment, the hotel will have newly refurbished rooms, seminar rooms and public areas as of October 2018. With its very central location, the hotel is the perfect starting point for all sights in Zurich. By foot you can reach the city center in just 10 minutes. The Kronenstrasse tram stop is right in front of the door and the main train station can be reached in less than 5 minutes with the tram numbers 11 & 14. From the hotel the airport can be reached in 25 minutes. 74 modern air conditioned rooms. Free Wlan and welcome drink. Luxury rooms with kitchenette and storage room are predestinated for long stays in Zurich. Restaurant & Bar differente with mediterranean cuisine and Swiss specialties. Banquet and Seminarrooms. Parking, ideal reachability by public transport. ISO 9001:2008 and ISO 14000 certified.

Sheraton Zurich Hotel is the new gathering place in Zurich. Experience Zurich as you have never experienced it before! Sheraton Zurich Hotel is the perfect starting point for a stroll through the area and its trendy shops and bars. Sheraton brings people together. Meet the young and cosmopolitan neighborhood in our bar NUOVO or at the Route 26 Steakhouse. The city center and the central station are only a few minutes away by tram. The tram station Toni-Areal is located directly in front of the hotel. Our cozy rooms and suites, some with impressive views over Zurich, are your place of rest and relaxation in the lively Zurich West district. Whether it is a seminar with an accompanying entertainment program, a small meeting or a private event, there are 8 light-flooded, flexible meeting rooms for up to 230 persons make your event shine at the Sheraton Hotel Zurich. Also our kiosk in the lobby gives you the opportunity to buy a wide range of snacks and beverages 24-hours a day. Located in Hardturm Park in the up-and-coming Zürich West area, the Sheraton Zurich Hotel is surrounded by numerous boutiques, restaurants, and theatres. Culture lovers will like Schauspielhaus Zürich Schiffbau stage. Performances are held here in an industrial hall with listed building status. Take the tram from the nearby Toni-Areal stop, and be in the centre in around 15 minutes. The Sheraton Zurich Hotel is located in the uprising district 5 of Zurich, which is known as a vibrant mix of business, residential, nightlife and industrial.

The Hotel Schweizerhof in Zurich offers a friendly service in a luxurious and elegant atmosphere. The rooms are tastefully furnished with great attention for every detail and offer the comforts of a 4-star superior hotel. The rooms provide bathrooms in Italian granite, electronically adjustable beds, air-conditioning and triple-glass windows. The Hotel Schweizerhof is located in the centre of Zurich, next to the main railway station and the world famous Bahnhofstraße. Shops, international banks and several sights are only a few minutes away. The direct train takes 10 minutes from the railway station to the airport. flat screen TV with Sensiq Entertainment-System.Butler Service after check In from Monday to Friday. Free entry to fitness and health Club Holmes Place

From the moment guests step into “Romantik Hotel Europe Zurich” they can enjoy a memorable time in a truly charming hotel. Beautifully decorated to create a peaceful, romantic atmosphere, guest rooms are a wonderful blend of classic style and modern comforts, promising a fantastic night’s sleep. A delicious breakfast buffet is served each morning. Located moments from Lake Zurich, the hotel is close to Stadelhofen Station for easy access. The key sites of the city are within walking distance of the hotel doors. St. Peter’s Church (1km) is a must-see for history enthusiasts. The nearby Lake Promenade (1km), is a popular, colourful area. From here, guests can take a tour of the lake. At our restaurant Quaglinos we serve an american breakfast buffet at CHF 28.00 per person and a continental breakfast at CHF 10.00 per person. We are looking forward to your review.

The hotel Seehof in Zurich is small and fashionably redesigned. The 19 elegant rooms and the junior suite are all furnished to offer maximum comfort. The cosy hotel restaurant serves regional and European cuisine. The hotel Seehof is situated in Zurich, in the Seefeld district, just behind the Opera House and conveniently located to the beautiful Lake Zurich. The historic old town and the elegant Bahnhofstrasse are also nearby. Sporty guests will enjoy a tennis court in the immediate proximity. Our reception is occupied from 7 am – 10 pm. Should you arrive later than 10 pm, please check in and collect your room key from the night porter at the Hotel Europe which is just around the corner on the Dufourstrasse 4. The according information is attached to the front door. Thank you very much for your understanding.

The small hotel Rössli in Zurich is located in a historical old town house and offers a special ambiance. All 27 rooms are individually furnished in style and colour and equipped with the most comfortable amenities. Even more luxury is provided by the suites with roof terrace providing a fantastic view. The hotel Rössli is located in the heart of the historical centre of Zurich, close to the promenade. Many sights like the Opera, the Art House, Bahnhofstrasse and many cafés and restaurants are nearby. The railway station and the airport are quickly and easily accessible by public transport. parkhouse Hohe Promenade, parking costs for 24 hours 40 CHF Check-in after 10 pm in our bar next door or from the night porter at the Hotel Helmhaus, which is just around the corner

With its beautifully modern guest rooms and a great range of amenities, a pleasant stay is all but guaranteed at the “Hotel Oerlikon”. Visitors can enjoy a delicious breakfast buffet each morning, before a day of sightseeing or successful meetings in the well-equipped conference space. The on-site restaurant, Brasserie Ö, serves regional, international and local cuisine. Located to the north of Zurich’s city centre, guests to this hotel can enjoy easy access to the business hubs of the area thanks to the nearby Zürich Oerlikon train station, which can be reached in 5 minutes by foot. Nearby sites include Theater 11, the Hallenstadion and the Irchel Campus of the University of Zurich. rooms (facing the street side) are with parquet floor, safety box, TV, telephone, euro-electrical plugs, air-conditioner Free W-LAN all over the hotel. A printer is at your disposal. 24h bar service is available in our lobby. In our Restaurant Ö with bar and smorkers lounge you enjoy varios dishes or drinks at the bar. Opening times: Monday to Friday, 11.30 am to 24.00 pm. Warm dishes are served until 23.00 pm.

In your quiet room, you can recapitulate the day’s events and sleep well after a hard day’s work. The restaurants convince with warm ambience. On your business trip to Zurich, enjoy the professional atmosphere of the Hotel Spirgarten. Situated about 5 kilometres from the central train station and 8 kilometres from the large exhibition centre, the hotel’s location will make your stay a convenient one. The surrounding neighbourhood of Altstetten is furthermore home to various company branches. After successfully finished business, you can find the city’s airport at a distance of 15 kilometres from the hotel. In 8048 you can enjoy original Elsässer Flammkuchen and also Classics such as burgers and club sandwich. From Monday to Friday there is also a daily changing lunch menu and evening there are good traditional food, which is a modern interpretation of our kitchen brigade. When booking more than 5 rooms, different policies may apply. Due to refurbishment in our restaurant our Restaurant 8048 will be closed from 25th June until 30th July 2017.

Enjoy the spacious hotel rooms and their peaceful ambience during your stay at this modern city hotel. The dark wood floors create an elegant flair and various artists have decorated the rooms individually in modest style. Start your day right with a good breakfast. About 450 metres from the railway station Zurich Altstetten, you will find the modern city hotel The Flag. Discover the surrounding business district and find the tram station Grimselstrasse at a distance of 200 metres. The old town on the bank of the Limmat River is worth a visit after 3.5 kilometres. On your day of departure, the city’s airport is reachable after 10 kilometres. The hotel has various Artists decoring the rooms. All rooms have a large Fridget. You can find direct USB Plugs included in the regular plugs. Free Internet via HSIA, WIFI. Virtual Concierge, digital Newspapers, Fitness Room

For travelers who need a comfortable hotel room near Zurich City and enjoy easy access to the various parts of the city, the B & B Hotel Zurich Wallisellen is the right choice. Our hotel is easily accessible by car or public transport. As a guest of our house we spoil you during your stay with an excellent service, well-kept hospitality and comfortable living. The B & B Hotel Zurich Wallisellen with its ideal location is located in the immediate vicinity of internationally operating companies such as Canon, Microsoft, Allianz, Reishauer, Ecolab, SVTI Wallisellen etc. At the B & B Hotel you will also benefit from the attractive and affordable prices. Whether you’re returning from a full day out or need to meet someone for business or pleasure, our bar is your perfect place for getting together or winding down. Enjoy both cold and hot beverages prepared by our expert staff. It is a great option for a more relaxed business meeting or to meet friends and colleagues. Our hotel bar is open until midnight. For maximum flexibility, our B&B Hotel Zurich Wallisellen is open 24/7. You can check in starting at 12:00 p.m. and still make your day meetings. Check-out is at 11:00 on the day of departure. Our hotel staff is there to provide you with all the necessary information to make your stay in Zurich a most pleasant one. For tourists and business travellers visiting from abroad, not to worry, we speak English and German.

Experience a touch of luxury at the Leuen Landgasthof. The rooms are well-sized and come in a variety of standards. Unwind as you enjoy the restaurants wide and diverse dishes. The hotel is also a truly prestigious address for events of all stripes. HRS guests benefit from free Wi-Fi access in their rooms. The hotel is conveniently situated in Uitikon Waldegg, a charming suburb of Zurich. Within a few minutes by car, the city centre of Zurich is reachable and allures with its lovely old town and the splendid Lake Zurich. Zurich Airport is located at a distance of 20 kilometres. Parking spaces & construction site A new residential district is being built next to Landgasthof Leuen. The work may cause noise that may affect you. The construction team strives to keep these to a minimum. Therefore, our parking space is slightly shifted. We have a small parking lot in front of our house and a provisional parking lot after the construction site (about 1min walk).

The 4-star hotel Belair in Zurich provides 35 standard rooms as well as 12 business rooms. They are all equipped with shower/toilet or bathtub/toilet. Furthermore, you may expect a flat screen TV, a minibar and free Wi-Fi. After a successful business day, you can wind down in the fitness studio, which is just a short walk away from the hotel, or at the cosy bar in the hotel-owned restaurant. In the restaurant, you will be spoilt with authentic Italian cuisine. The hotel is located in Zurich, in the neighbourhood Wallisellen. You reach the city centre within a 10 minute walk. Both Zurich Airport and the Zurich trade fair are situated 5 minutes away. The stop of the bus line 759 and the tram line 12 are right in front of the hotel. The shopping mall Glatt is also nearby, and the city centre attracts with its beautiful old town. Parking free of Charge, complementary WiFi

MOOI welcomes you with modern and first-class serviced apartments, which are fully furnished and equipped with accessoirs such as cutlery, crockery, dishwasher and refrigerator. The MOOI flats are located directly on Zürcherstrasse 133, the main street that runs through the middle of Schlieren. In the same building is an elegant rooftop restaurant with regional, seasonal and international dishes and a view over the roofs of Schlieren. There is also a large grocery shop and a modern gym. The Müllingen tram stop is right in front of the building and takes you to Zurich city centre within 10 minutes. In the immediate vicinity of the MOOI Apartments you will find a shopping centre, a climbing and tennis hall, a bowling centre and the family garden, which invites you to relax and take a walk. Not far from the MOOI Apartments are other shopping centres, an outdoor swimming pool, Vita Parcours and many small shops. The Swiss Life Arena of the ZSC Lions is a 5-minute walk away and the Letzigrund athletics stadium can be reached by tram within 5 minutes. During your stay you can explore Zurich by bike or e-scooter. Book this conveniently online via our website. MOOI Apartments specializes in the rental of first-class equipped and furnished apartments. Particular attention is paid to a coherent furnishing and design concept as well as the highest functionality. Through our digital guest portfolio in web app format, you can check in and out with us 24/7. You can also conveniently book additional services such as cleaning, parking or breakfast buffet at the touch of a button. The process is fast and completely electronic, without lengthy postal correspondence. In the same building there is also a supermarket, a fitness center and an exclusive rooftop restaurant with a roof terrace. Parking spaces are also available in sufficient number.
